Vial | 5 ml | gm
Active ingredients :
• Tranexamic
• Kojic acid
• Arbutin
• Glycolic acid
• Ascorbic acid

—-

Benefits :
• Whitening mix achieves a unique depigmenting, whitening, and mattifying effect that restores uniformity and luminosity to the skin, making it currently one of the leading lighteners for blemished skin.
• Helps to reduce and prevent the appearance of hyperpigmentation and improves the appearance of both resistant dark spots and translucent reddish spots caused by surface blood vessels.
• Reduce the appearance of pigmentations on face and body.
• Regenerative skin treatment for surface areas with ageing sings and striae.
• prevents dead cells from clumping together, thus increasing cell turnover.

—-

Whitening mix for :
– Melasma (hyperpigmentation)
– Post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation
-Age spots .
– Excessive exposure to sunlight
– Acne-prone skin
– Stretchmarks

—-

Areas of treatment :
• Face
• Body (Localized)

How to use ?
By injection or derma-pen
Dilution 1: 0.5 Proportion
